content:
it took less than 20 more second to solve it in bash with less than 40 chars yesterday
because test case 5 was missing

i hoped that it was a little harder and .....
15 second to solve with one for and one if ... really too esay

all your clashes are solvable in one or two lines ... can't you try to make them a little harder ...? clash have to be solvable in less than 5 minutes, not 5 seconds ....

Wow much feedback in one nigth but everything is true.
First: Corrected mistake with got goals etc.
Second: Deleted Reverse
Third: Corrected typos
Forth: Added test Case number 5
Fifth: Corrected Crazy League
Thank's for your feedback!

In all test cases the team that has the highest goal balance also has the highest number of goals. I suggest that some test case have the highest goal balance with the lowest number of goals, for example:
2
X 10 10 9
Y 10 5 0 (leading team)

"Crazy League" has too many numbers in Hulk's line.

It is not clear what "shot goals" and "got goals" mean. From their use it must be goals scored by this team vs. goals scored by opponents against this team. But it sounds like attempted shots on goal  vs. goals scored.
Maybe need to add a rule when some team are same point and same shot goals else got goals is useless

A few typos:
"There a three criterias:" -> "There are three deciding criteria:"
Criteria is plural by default, check https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/criteria
I don't know soccer but in other sports it is goals for (shot goals) and goals against (got goals). Maybe add an extra goal word in the second criterion: "The goal difference".

This is only my maximalist personality:
"Third: If 1 and 2" -> "Third: If based on first and second criteria they"

And dots at the end of each criterion.

Output:
"Name of leading team" -> "Name of the leading team"

Otherwise I like this proposal, it is not too easy.
If it's too easy for CoC I could maybe add if the input is possible or just contribiute it as a Reverse puzzle.
